mainHero.title: Options Wizard
mainHero.subtitle: Options trading made easy.
mainHero.description: Our experienced team conducts comprehensive research on options, so you don't have to. Learn the ropes, receive real-time options alerts, and optimize your trading strategies with a community dedicated to your success. Start your journey towards becoming a proficient options trader with us!

items.title: No Trading Experience Necessary
items.description: Not a trader? Use our teams lightning fast option alerts to dramatically increase your returns and the accuracy of option plays.

items.title: Trade Smarter, Profit Bigger
items.description: Boost your trading with 24/7 real-time alerts, economic data, and access to private channels from our expert and communicative team. Learn, trade, and profit confidently with our educational tools and track record of wins/losses, even when not subscribed. ðŸ’°

features.title: The High Wizards
features.subtitle: Meet The Team
features.description: Our team works together in bringing you the best in all things trading. Subscribe and get access to their alerts, livestreams and one-on-one in Discord.

items.name: Tye
items.description: Tye is a day trading maestro, specializing in the SP500 (SPY) but adept at trading anything, even penny stocks, with success. A wizard at charting, technical analysis, and quick returns, he's your go-to for mastering the day-trading matrix.

items.name: Bill
items.description: Bill is an experienced trader specializing in options, technical analysis, charting, patterns, and research. A natural teacher, he is dedicated to helping everyone succeed, focusing on shorter-term trades, whether intraday or a few days swing. For top-notch technical analysis, catalysts, and day trading insights, Bill is a key member of our expert team.

items.name: Jay
items.description: Jay is an expert in mid-term option and stock swings, focusing on safer blue chips and SP500 stocks rather than riskier options like biotechs. Known for delivering surprising returns that don't surprise our team, she is the go-to for those unable to trade actively throughout the day. For exceptional option plays, swings, and technical analysis, Jay is a standout choice in our expert team.

items.name: Dave
items.description: Dave leverages his decades of experience in finance and accounting to specialize in stock share and option swings, penny stocks, biotechs, and retirement portfolio recommendations. His plays may range from a day to a few months, always indicating the timeframe in his callouts. For exceptional guidance on swings, penny stocks, biotechs, retirement planning, and other financial expertise, Dave is a key asset to our expert team.

items.name: Weekly
features: Complete access to our trades & catalysts

items.name: Monthly
features: Complete access to our trades & catalysts

sections.name: Tik Tok
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
